pageTitle: The Bay Hotel | CampsBay.Com - Camps Bay Online
textBeforeTable: - Personal Bar - Tea / Coffee making facilities - Electronic safe - International Plug Points (220v) A/C - DVD players - Satellite Television - iPod docking stations - Internet Access - Air-conditioning & heating - Pillow Service - King/Twin beds - Hairdryers - Twin wardrobes - Heated Towel Rails - Double vanity - Separate bath and shower - Private entrance lobby Standard room specifications With a spacious balcony overlooking the ocean and every comfort within the confines of your room, we think you might want to stay forever! The recently renovated interior creates a cosy atmosphere where you can indulge your holiday fantasies. The dressing room with ample cupboard space is a private space to relax, opening up to the exquisite marble bathroom, complete with oval bath and stunning finishes. The State-of-the-art audiovisual equipment allows you to pass the time in the lap of luxury after a full day spent sight-seeing. The Penthouse is defined by its mesmerising sea views and expansive space. A Hollywood style staircase invites you into this private haven of driftwood hues and greys…to exhale from the vibrant bustle of Camps Bay. 3 2 1
